title: Fox Campaigns
author: Fox Campaigns
content: Don’t you think it's unfair that high return strategies are reserved for an elite?We think it had to stop, so we decided to make these returns available for everyone.We created the $ALF.Learn more about the Alfcoin1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 11 October - January 02 (12 weeks)2. $20,000 in $ALF tokens will be distributed within 1 month after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread! 4. Connect with Alfcoin in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/Alfcoinofficial- Telegram Group: https://t.me/AlfcoinCommunity- Telegram Channel: https://t.me/Alfcoincomnews- Discord: https://discord.gg/T7Ux4rBkxX- Learn more about  Alfcoin:  https://www.alfcoin.net/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;- Bounty Group:  https://t.me/alfcoinbounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsNote:If you are disqualified for any reason, you will NOT receive any rewards. All rights reserved by Fox Campaigns and the Alfcoin team. We can make any changes to the campaign rules, if applicable.By joining these campaigns, you're accepting these above terms.Code:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:ERC wallet address:$20,000 worth of $ALF tokens will be distributed in this campaign. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Twitter: 30%- Content: 25%- Translation: 15%- Telegram: 10%- Discord: 10%- Reddit: 10%Note:There is a limit of 500 participants in each campaign.Tokens:-1 - 10 stakes depending on the content quality (video/article).Rules:- Videos must have at least 200 views to qualify.- We accept original videos only with at least 3 minutes.- Only English language is accepted in videos and articles.- Write a good description about Alfcoin in your video. - Videos with no user's voice will not be accepted.- Attach Alfcoin links in your video description and articles.- Only YouTube videos will be accepted!- 2 videos and 2 articles per person are allowed.- Articles must have at least 50 views to qualify.- We accept original articles only with at least 500 words.- Submit articles on Medium, Steem, Linkedin, ReadCash.  - Visit alfcoin.net to learn more about it and write your articles.JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Alfcoin Twitter account: @Alfcoinofficial3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Use these hashtags; #$ALF #$Alfcoin #ethereum #ERC20 #foxcampaigns #web3 #finance #hedgefund #CryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Twitter Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Tweet Link #1:Tweet Link #2:Tweet Link #3:Tweet Link #4:Tweet Link #5:Retweet Link #1: Retweet Link #2:Retweet Link #3:Retweet Link #4:Retweet Link #5:Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 Karma to participate.2. Make 2 custom posts per day about Alfcoin. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.3. Minimum of 10 posts per week (10 custom posts).4. Use these hashtags; Use these hashtags; #$ALF #$Alfcoin #ethereum #ERC20 #foxcampaigns #web3 #finance #hedgefund #CryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Reddit Report ]Reddit Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Stakes:- 1 quality post: 1 stake.- Wear $ALF Avatar until the end of the campaign and you will get stakes.- Download AvatarRules:1. Must join Alfcoin Telegram group: https://t.me/AlfcoinCommunity2. Write posts in the official Alfcoin group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam post you will be banned immediately!4. Max posts per day: 2, Max posts per week: 105. You can ask questions about Alfcoin in the official group, but do not Spam!6. You will not be paid if you remove $ALF avatar before the end of the campaign!7. Posts like "Hello, Hi, Good Project, etc) will not be counted!8. DO NOT USE HASHTAGS IN YOUR TELEGRAM POSTS!JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Telegram Report ]Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Stakes:- 2 stakes per one quality post- Maximum 10 posts per weekRules:1. Write your posts in the Alfcoin server: https://discord.gg/T7Ux4rBkxX2. If you write any spam post you will be banned immediately3. Max posts per day: 2, Max posts per week: 104. You can ask questions about Alfcoin in their server, but do not Spam!5. If you have any problem with this campaign, ask in the bounty group!6. We count only 2 posts per day, make report weekly to receive stakesJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Discord Report ]Discord Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Rules:- You must have prior experience translating ANN, whitepapers, and websites.- Using Google Translate is prohibited. If we discover its use at any time, you will be excluded from the bounty.- Not all translators will be accepted, each submitted work will be reviewed manually and accepted or rejected.- Use any of these languages; Spanish, Italian, French, German, Korean, Arabic, Vietnamese, Thai, Russian, Hindi, Portuguese, Polish, Chinese, UrduStakes:- 50 stakes for translating $ALF whitepaper- 70 stakes for translating $ALF websiteSUBMIT DOCs   -   SPREADSHEETS Week 01: 11 Oct - 17Week 02: 18 Oct - 24Week 03: 25 Oct - 31Week 04: 01 Nov - 07Week 05: 08 Nov - 14Week 06: 15 Nov - 21Week 07: 22 Nov - 28Week 08: 29 Nov - Dec 05Week 09: 06 Dec - 12Week 10: 13 Dec - 19Week 11: 20 Dec - 26Week 12: 27 Dec - Jan 02
